description: Integrate CARLA simulator with ROS1 topics for vehicle control and sensor data. Supports synchronous and asynchronous modes, handling multiple actors and sensors.
expected_outcome: Control commands from ROS are applied in CARLA.
Actor states and world info are updated each tick.
Clock and status messages are published to ROS.
Ego vehicle commands are handled correctly in synchronous mode.
Spawn/destroy objects and retrieve blueprints via ROS services.
